mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( username, password, nickname, avatar, background, gender, description, exp, coin, vip, state, role, auth, authMsg, createDate, deleteDate ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, #{background}, #{gender}, #{description}, #{exp}, #{coin}, #{vip}, #{state}, #{role}, #{auth}, #{authMsg}, #{createDate}, #{deleteDate} )
